titles.title: Dean Gallo Cancer Patient Compassion Act of 2004
To amend title II of the Social Security Act to waive the 24-month waiting period for Medicare coverage of individuals disabled with distant stage cancer.
Dean Gallo Cancer Patient Compassion Act of 2004

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Social Security.

term.name: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

bill.summary: The Dean Gallo Cancer Patient Compassion Act of 2004 - Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to waive the 24 month waiting period for Medicare coverage of certain individuals with distant stage cancer.
